item.title: Getting started with jqgrid
item.description: The first grid # JqGrid is implemented as jQuery plugin, our plugin uses jQuery UI CSS or Bootstrap CSS for styling. Thus one would have to include the corresponding JavaScript and CSS files. The second basic thing, which one should know, is the fact that free jqGrid uses HTML internally. One would have to create an empty element to reserve the place where the grid should be created. Finally one should call jQuery("#tableId").
